title: Founding of Stormharbor
description: The city of Stormharbor is founded as a trading post on the coast, quickly growing into a bustling port.

title: Arrival of the Azorians
description: The Azorian people arrive and settle in the region, bringing new customs and magic.

title: The First Void Event
description: A mysterious void rift opens near Stormharbor, causing panic and the first recorded appearance of void creatures.

title: Council Assassinations
description: A series of assassinations shakes the city council, leading to political upheaval and the rise of new factions.

title: The Sanctuary Hills Asylum Incident
description: Strange disturbances at the Sanctuary Hills Asylum are resolved by the party, restoring peace.
